title: Most miserable countries in the world 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Misery index score in the y axis.
The maximum Misery index score 1746439.1 is found at Country Venezuela and the minimum is found at Paraguay where Country is 22.9.
The highest Country Venezuela has 1746416.2 more Misery index score than the lowest Country Paraguay.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Misery index score in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Misery index score for 20 number of Countrys.
The maximum Misery index score 1746439.1 is found at Country Venezuela and the minimum is found at Paraguay where Country is 22.9.
Country Argentina has the second highest value for Misery index score.
The difference of Misery index score between the highest and lowest Country is 1746416.2.
Misery index score at Country Venezuela is 1746439.1 , second place is Argentina at 105.6, and thirdly is Iran at 75.7.
The Country Venezuela has 19.99 times more Misery index score than average.
The Misery index score is 1747183.6 if we add up values of all Countrys.
